# Author: Tim Brockway. Student ID: 30259316 Email: BrockwayTim@My.CCSU.edu
# Purpose: To demonstrate the effect of disease prevalence on the
# - Copy & paste the following link into a webbrowser and enter.
# - The web page will explain how to run the program and its plots.
# Medical screening tests vaunting very high "general accuracy" can give
# staggering levels of false results when the prevalence of a disease is low.
# This program explores the effect the prevalence of an infection in a
# population on the usefullness of screening tests. The goal is to
# demonstrate that screening tests are complex and less reliable
# A GUI invites the user to enter the following medical test statistics.
# CheckBoxes allowing the plotting of different statitics.
# x axis. A range of disease prevalances.
# (2) A Matplotlib menu permitting saving the plot, zooming etc.
# (3) A CSV file with the plot data.(Optional)
# (4) A print of the plot data. (Optional)
